items.title: Instagram now alerts parents if their teen searches for suicide or self-harm content
items.creator: Aisha Malik
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Instagram now alerts parents if their teen searches for suicide or self-harm content
items.content: The Meta-owned social platform says that while it already blocks users from searching for suicide and self-harm content, these new alerts are designed to make sure parents are aware if their teen is repeatedly trying to search for this content so that they can support them.
